Description:
Lucas Brémond, Chief Software Architect at Loft Orbital, explains how AI not only supports their vision to simplify space operations, but also enables them to achieve more with fewer resources, all while maintaining high-quality standards. From transforming data to streamlining their entire process – AI unlocks valuable growth opportunities.

Watch Lucas Brémond, Chief Software Architect at Loft Orbital AI Challenger video: https://msft.it/6052SU3uE

#Microsoft #MicrosoftCloud #MicrosoftAITransformation
Author: Microsoft Cloud
Title: AI Challenger | Loft Orbital: Building smarter satellites with AI
